channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-7295|2024-08-04T09:25:48.950Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to delete or download protected log data via improper access controls in the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-7293|2024-08-04T09:25:48.986Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user with low permissions to change the system's root password via improper access controls in the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-7256|2024-08-04T09:25:48.956Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) Prior to 9.1 update 6 Mar 2020 Update allows attackers to unspecified impact via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2020-7306|2024-08-04T09:25:48.986Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention%28dlp%29
item.description: Unprotected Storage of Credentials vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) for Mac prior to 11.5.2 allows local users to gain access to the ADRMS username and password via unprotected log files containing plain text

item.title: CVE-2019-3651|2024-08-04T19:12:09.709Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Information Disclosure vulnerability in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD prior to 4.8 allows remote authenticated attackers to gain access to ePO as an administrator via using the atduser credentials, which were too permissive.

item.title: CVE-2020-7336|2024-08-04T09:25:49.109Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross Site Request Forgery vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) prior to 10.1.7.35 and NSM 9.x prior to 9.2.9.55 may allow an attacker to change the configuration of the Network Security Manager via a carefully crafted HTTP request.

item.title: CVE-2020-7318|2024-08-04T09:25:48.958Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchistrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchestrator (ePO) prior to 5.10.9 Update 9 allows administrators to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via multiple parameters where the administrator's entries were not correctly sanitized.

item.title: CVE-2020-7302|2024-08-04T09:25:49.041Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated attackers to upload malicious files to the DLP case management section via lack of sanity checking.

item.title: CVE-2019-3649|2024-08-04T19:12:09.656Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Information Disclosure vulnerability in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) prior to 4.8 allows remote authenticated attackers to gain access to hashed credentials via carefully constructed POST request extracting incorrectly recorded data from log files.

item.title: CVE-2020-7304|2024-08-04T09:25:49.056Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Cross site request forgery vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated remote attacker to embed a CRSF script via adding a new label.

item.title: CVE-2020-7339|2024-08-04T09:25:49.002Z -- mcafee -- database%20security
item.description: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm vulnerability in McAfee Database Security Server and Sensor prior to 4.8.0 in the form of a SHA1 signed certificate that would allow an attacker on the same local network to potentially intercept communication between the Server and Sensors.

item.title: CVE-2019-3660|2024-08-04T19:12:09.655Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of HTTP requests in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) prior to 4.8 allows remote authenticated attacker to execute commands on the server remotely via carefully constructed HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2020-7284|2024-08-04T09:25:48.430Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) prior to 10.1.7.7 allows local users to gain unauthorised access to the root account via execution of carefully crafted commands from the restricted command line interface (CLI).

item.title: CVE-2019-3638|2024-08-04T19:12:09.685Z -- mcafee -- web%20gateway%28mwg%29
item.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Administrators web console in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) 7.8.x prior to 7.8.2.13 allows remote attackers to collect sensitive information or execute commands with the MWG administrator's credentials via tricking the administrator to click on a carefully constructed malicious link.

item.title: CVE-2019-3650|2024-08-04T19:12:09.655Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Information Disclosure vulnerability in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD prior to 4.8 allows remote authenticated attackers to gain access to the atduser credentials via carefully constructed GET request extracting insecurely information stored in the database.

item.title: CVE-2020-7316|2024-08-04T09:25:49.056Z -- mcafee -- file%20%26%20removable%20media%20protection%20%28frp%29
item.description: Unquoted service path vulnerability in McAfee File and Removable Media Protection (FRP) prior to 5.3.0 allows local users to execute arbitrary code, with higher privileges, via execution and from a compromised folder. This issue may result in files not being encrypted when a policy is triggered.

item.title: CVE-2020-7258|2024-08-04T09:25:48.593Z -- mcafee -- network%20security%20management%20%28nsm%29
item.description: Cross site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Network Security Management (NSM) Prior to 9.1 update 6 Mar 2020 Update allows attackers to unspecified impact via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2019-3640|2024-08-04T19:12:09.699Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Unprotected Transport of Credentials in ePO extension in McAfee Data Loss Prevention 11.x prior to 11.4.0 allows remote attackers with access to the network to collect login details to the LDAP server via the ePO extension not using a secure connection when testing LDAP connectivity.

item.title: CVE-2020-7268|2024-08-04T09:25:48.864Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20email%20gateway%20%28meg%29
item.description: Path Traversal vulnerability in McAfee McAfee Email Gateway (MEG) prior to 7.6.406 allows remote attackers to traverse the file system to access files or directories that are outside of the restricted directory via external input to construct a path name that should be within a restricted directory.

item.title: CVE-2019-3663|2024-08-04T19:12:09.599Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Unprotected Storage of Credentials vulnerability in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) prior to 4.8 allows local attacker to gain access to the root password via accessing sensitive files on the system. This was originally published with a CVSS rating of High, further investigation has resulted in this being updated to Critical. The root password is common across all instances of ATD prior to 4.8. See the Security bulletin for further details

item.title: CVE-2020-7298|2024-08-04T09:25:48.965Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: Unexpected behavior violation in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) prior to 16.0.R26 allows local users to turn off real time scanning via a specially crafted object making a specific function call.

item.title: CVE-2019-3587|2024-08-04T19:12:09.648Z -- mcafee -- total%20protection%20%28mtp%29
item.description: DLL Search Order Hijacking vulnerability in Microsoft Windows client in McAfee Total Protection (MTP) Prior to 16.0.18 allows local users to execute arbitrary code via execution from a compromised folder.

item.title: CVE-2020-7294|2024-08-04T09:25:48.869Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to delete or download protected files via improper access controls in the REST interface.

item.title: CVE-2019-3661|2024-08-04T19:12:09.667Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) prior to 4.8 allows remote authenticated attacker to execute database commands via carefully constructed time based payloads.

item.title: CVE-2020-7305|2024-08-04T09:25:48.994Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows a low privileged remote attacker to create new rule sets via incorrect validation of user credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-3581|2024-08-04T19:12:09.492Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway
item.description: Improper input validation in the proxy component of McAfee Web Gateway 7.8.2.0 and later allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted HTTP request parameter.

item.title: CVE-2020-7296|2024-08-04T09:25:48.991Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to access protected configuration files via improper access control in the user interface.

item.title: CVE-2019-3584|2024-08-04T19:12:09.473Z -- mcafee -- mvision%20endpoint
item.description: Exploitation of Authentication vulnerability in MVision Endpoint in McAfee MVision Endpoint Prior to 1811 Update 1 (18.11.31.62) allows authenticated administrator users --> administrators to Remove MVision Endpoint via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2019-3662|2024-08-04T19:12:09.656Z -- mcafee -- advanced%20threat%20defense%20%28atd%29
item.description: Path Traversal: '/absolute/pathname/here' vulnerability in McAfee Advanced Threat Defense (ATD) prior to 4.8 allows remote authenticated attacker to gain unintended access to files on the system via carefully constructed HTTP requests.

item.title: CVE-2020-7301|2024-08-04T09:25:49.031Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Cross Site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated attackers to trigger alerts via the file upload tab in the DLP case management section.

item.title: CVE-2020-7303|2024-08-04T09:25:49.063Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Cross Site scripting vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated remote user to trigger scripts to run in a user's browser via adding a new label.

item.title: CVE-2020-7307|2024-08-04T09:25:49.046Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention%28dlp%29
item.description: Unprotected Storage of Credentials vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) for Mac prior to 11.5.2 allows local users to gain access to the RiskDB username and password via unprotected log files containing plain text credentials.

item.title: CVE-2020-7300|2024-08-04T09:25:49.062Z -- mcafee -- dlp%20epo%20extension
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability in McAfee Data Loss Prevention (DLP) ePO extension prior to 11.5.3 allows authenticated remote attackers to change the configuration when logged in with view only privileges via carefully constructed HTTP post messages.

item.title: CVE-2019-3654|2024-08-04T19:12:09.712Z -- mcafee -- client%20proxy%20%28mcp%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass vulnerability in the Microsoft Windows client in McAfee Client Proxy (MCP) prior to 3.0.0 allows local user to bypass scanning of web traffic and gain access to blocked sites for a short period of time via generating an authorization key on the client which should only be generated by the network administrator.

item.title: CVE-2020-7317|2024-08-04T09:25:48.957Z -- mcafee -- epolicy%20orchistrator%20%28epo%29
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability in McAfee ePolicy Orchistrator (ePO) prior to 5.10.9 Update 9 allows administrators to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via parameter values for "syncPointList" not being correctly sanitsed.

item.title: CVE-2020-7292|2024-08-04T09:25:48.627Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Inappropriate Encoding for output context vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows a remote attacker to cause MWG to return an ambiguous redirect response via getting a user to click on a malicious URL.

item.title: CVE-2020-7297|2024-08-04T09:25:48.996Z -- mcafee -- mcafee%20web%20gateway%20%28mwg%29
item.description: Privilege Escalation vulnerability in McAfee Web Gateway (MWG) prior to 9.2.1 allows authenticated user interface user to access protected dashboard data via improper access control in the user interface.
